N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 107.8 - Cops financed equipment acquisitions

State Regulations

All State departments, agencies, the City University of New

York or any other entity purchasing equipment through the use of COPS must
acquire such equipment by outright purchase when the cost of such equipment is
$250,000 or less. Multiple items of the same type of equipment, or related
items of equipment, procured pursuant to a single request for proposal may be
grouped under one or several contracts, as part of a procurement package to
reach the aforementioned dollar level. Notes
